Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.listeners.ConcreteMessageListenerSubscriber
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.GameModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageListenerSubscriber, Game, ProfessorChecker
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameModelTeams
public class GameModel extends ConcreteMessageListenerSubscriber implements Game, ProfessorChecker
This class represents the game model.

      Specified by:

    • playAssistantCard

      public boolean playAssistantCard(AssistantCard assistantCard)
      Try to play an assistant card. If someone has already played it check that the current player hasn't other cards playable. Checks if the player had that card in hand and if it is the correct phase to play a card. Notifies the listeners.
      Specified by:
      playAssistantCard in interface Game
      Parameters:
      assistantCard - the card the player wants to play
      Returns:
      if the card was played successfully.

    • moveStudentToHall

      public boolean moveStudentToHall(int entranceIndex)
      Moves a student from the Entrance to the Hall of the current player if the player can play, the hall is not full and the index is valid. then proceeds to check if the professors need to be re-distributed between the players Notifies the listeners.
      Specified by:
      moveStudentToHall in interface Game
      Parameters:
      entranceIndex - of the student that will be moved to the Hall
      Returns:
      if the student was successfully moved to the hall.

    • moveStudentToIsland

      public boolean moveStudentToIsland(int entranceIndex, int islandGroupIndex)
      Selects a student from the Entrance of the current Player's SchoolBoard, removes it from there and moves it to a selected island that is part of a selected IslandGroup. Checks if the player can play, if it is the correct game state and if the indexes are valid. Notifies the listeners.
      Specified by:
      moveStudentToIsland in interface Game
      Parameters:
      entranceIndex - of the slot occupied by the student that will be moved
      islandGroupIndex - of the IslandGroup that contains the selected island
      Returns:
      if the student was moved successfully.

    • moveMotherNature

      public boolean moveMotherNature(int num)
      Moves mother nature with a maximum movement of the number in the assistant card played. Notifies the listeners.
      Specified by:
      moveMotherNature in interface Game
      Parameters:
      num - of moves that MotherNature should make.
      Returns:
      if the move ended successfully.

    • executeGetStudentsFromCloud

      public boolean executeGetStudentsFromCloud(int cloudIndex)
      Moves the student currently residing on a cloud to the Entrance of the current Player if the game state and phase are correct, if the index is valid and if the cloud is not empty.
      Parameters:
      cloudIndex - of the selected cloud
      Returns:
      if the students were taken correctly from the cloud and added to the entrance.

    • getStudentsFromCloud

      public boolean getStudentsFromCloud(int cloudIndex)

      Specified by:
      getStudentsFromCloud in interface Game
      Parameters:

      Returns:
